    • Method Detail

      • launch

        public void launch(int updatesPerSecond,
          LoadSave loadSave)
        Launch launches the proram and starts it running
        Parameters:
        updatesPerSecond - - how many times per second it needs to update
        loadSave - - load save object. pass file to load save and load game.

      • run

        public void run()
        runs main game loop. Uses threads
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String gameObjectFilename)
        Load old game
        Parameters:
        gameObjectFilename - - load from old class

      • updateView

        public void updateView()
        Updateview sends message to view n times per second as identified in launch method

      • mainGameLoop

        public void mainGameLoop()
        Main game loop updates view with updated model state. If game is paused then state is put on hold, and view is (as a result) not updated.

      • launchScreen

        public void launchScreen(Screen screen)
        Launch a specific screen
        Parameters:
        screen - is the specific screen to launch

        public void loadNextLevel()
